text: Andorra competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona, Spain. Eight competitors, seven men and one woman, took part in five events in five sports. ==Athletics== ===Women=== ;Field events {|class=wikitable style=font-size:90% |- !rowspan=2|Athlete !rowspan=2|Event !colspan=2|Qualification !colspan=2|Final |- !Result !Rank !Result !Rank |- |Margarida Moreno |High jump |align=center|1.70 |align=center|41 |align=center colspan=2|Did not advance |} ==Cycling== Three male cyclists represented Andorra in 1992. ===Road=== ;Men {|class=wikitable style=font-size:90% |- !Athlete !Event !Time !Rank |- |Juan González |Road race |align=center colspan=2|Did not finish |- |Emili Pérez |Road race |align=center|4:58:25 |align=center|82 |- |Xavier Pérez |Road race |align=center|4:35:56 |align=center|31 |} ==Judo== ;Men {|class=wikitable style=font-size:90% |- !Athlete !Event !Result |- |Antoni Molne |Extra-Lightweight |=23 |} ==Sailing== ;Men {|class=wikitable style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="7"|Race !rowspan="2"|Score !rowspan="2"|Rank |- !1 !2 !3 !4 !5 !6 !7 |- |David Ramón Oscar Ramón |470 |align=center|21 |align=center|35 |align=center|37 |align=center|33 |align=center|3 |align=center|31 |align=center|(41) |align=center|160 |align=center|27 |} ==Shooting== ;Mixed {|class=wikitable style=font-size:90% |- !rowspan=2|Athlete !rowspan=2|Events !colspan=2|Qualification !colspan=2|Semifinal !colspan=2|Final !rowspan=2|Rank |- !Score !Rank !Score !Rank !Score !Rank |- |Joan Besoli |Trap |align=center|140 |align=center|=29 |colspan=4 align=center|Did not advance |align=center|=29 |} ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1992 Summer Olympics 1992 Category:1992 in Andorran sport
